name: xendit-unified-sdk-template
description: Xendit's Unified SDK repo and templates

scripts.build:go: openapi-generator-cli generate -g go -i api_docs/balance.yaml -o clients/go -t template/xen-go
scripts.build:php: openapi-generator-cli generate -g php -i api_docs/balance.yaml -o clients/php -t template/xen-php
scripts.build:python: openapi-generator-cli generate -g python -i api_docs/balance.yaml -o clients/python -t template/xen-python
scripts.build:typescript: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript -i api_docs/balance.yaml -o clients/typescript -t template/xen-typescript
